Snap <3 <img valign='text-bottom' width='20px' height='20px' src='data:image/png;base64,' />

* Some of our users asked us for [Slack notifications](https://slack.com) for their build pipelines. In addition to Campfire, Hipchat and WebHooks, Snap now offers the ability be notified via Slack. Read more about it on [our docs](http://docs.snap-ci.com/notifications/slack/).

Little things, nice things and bug fixes

* Improved the recipes dialog to become task oriented first, language oriented next.
* Fixed some issues with unicode characters causing console log tailing to not work when debugging builds.
* Also fixed issue with secure file not being written for some specific content.
